Constants
substances_config

all handles with config id `substances`

controls_config

all handles with config id `controls`

hshifter_config

all handles with config id `hshifter`

truck_config

all handles with config id `truck`

trailer_config

all handles with config id `trailer`

job_config

all handles with config id `job`

length_configs

contains the length of the handle config arrays

Functions
handleCfg
bool handleCfg(
const scs_named_value_t *info,
const configType type,
const unsigned int trailer_id
)

call the correct handle of the scs_config event

Parameters
info
const scs_named_value_t*

scs_config event value + name

type
const configType

type (id) of the scs_config event, <configType>

trailer_id
const unsigned int

trailer id if needed to handle the event (0-9)

Returns

true if event was handled

handleSubstancesId

Handle the Substances Id and write it to the space in memory.  It write up to SUBSTANCE_SIZE substances into the memory

See Also

scsConfigHandle

handleControlsShifterType

handle the Controls ShifterType and write it to the memory

handleHShifterSelectorCount

handle the HShifter SelectorCount and write it to the memory

handeHShifterResulting

handle the HSifter Resulting and write it to the memory
